title:
my donut
authir:
gal sinai
 omer sela
 
 desc:
 Walter the Narwhal want to try some of your donuts ... and by some, 
he means that he wants ALL of your donuts. Will you teach him about sharing,
 or will he teach you about not having any donuts left? More Donuts! is an short

 
 page 1:are those your donuts?
page 2: my name is walter,
may i have a donuts?
page 3: thank you! [PINK!!!]
